name: Candy Cars - fun games for kids & car games race
name_original: Candy Cars - fun games for kids & car games race
description:
Do you want to play the best car game? For fans of all the candy matching games! The best one yet!

Switch and match gummy candies for your cars. This has all the best boosters and combos!

Drop gems and crush ice in this epic game full of color for kids, girls and all ages!

Have fun playing the top match 3 puzzle game today!!

Can you be the best on the leaderboard! No wifi needed! Play anywhere!
